title: Tab-in Tab-out
body:
After the last patch all of the sudden my game takes a good 6-7 seconds + to tab in and out. I never had any problems like this before so i tried updating all of my drivers and the problem still persisted. I have a decent computer and there so be no reason for it to take this long. (I've tried running windowed but it seems that with 2 screens it wont allow me.

PC Specs

Windows 10
32 GB Ram
Nvidia GTX 980
i7-4790k 4GHz

replies.body: Tabbing out, especially in fullscreen, can put a lot of stress on your PC and is essentially pausing your game.  That's why when you task back in, you might see everything speed up really quickly as your network tries to communicate everything that's happened thus far.  You can uase the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot anything that could be slowing you down on League's side, or even try running the game in Borderless.  Otherwise, this could be a PC or hardware issue that's slowing down the process.  I hope that helps!
